d:testDescription.p: This test validates the operation of the svg element when there is no viewbox.
The document has x/y attributes set to (1000, 1000). Because x/y are ignored on the root svg element, the x/y origin should have no effect on the drawing.
The document contains squares and circles between the (100,100) and (200, 200) coordinates.

d:operatorScript.p: Run the test. No interaction required. If the test is run outside of the harness, the operator may resize the viewport.

d:passCriteria.p: The rendered picture should match the reference image. Changing the viewport size should have no effect on the placement or scale of the document's content.
